title: Que won't pop on new client
body: Ever since the old client was retired, I haven't been able to play on the new one :(  I can join a que, but my client just searches for games endlessly.   The "Cancel" button is completely unresponsive.  I've tried re-installing, running as admin, googling, and I couldn't find anything similiar :(  I'm on Windows 10 and my PC is less than a year old, not sure if it matters.  Any help would be greatly appreciated,  Cheers!

replies.body: Hmmmmm, it sounds like you may  be experiencing some client issues. Those are some pretty solid steps, I like where you're heading, but  I'd recommend making sure that you [**Enable Low Spec Mode**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_cq2vPiYULU) to reduce the amount of animations that the client has to render, alongside with a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7).
Wow, the Low spec mode thing worked.  Thank you so much

EDIT: Weird stuff is still happening.   Whenever I go to join a ranked game now, it says "Something unexpected happened while trying to create your lobby."  
 
I tried again, and was able to finally join a game. However, the lobby froze after 2 bans :(  Making a little bit of progress I guess lol
